title: Enhancement of acidic hydrogen evolution reaction efficiency through Cu/Ni-doped MFI-type protozeolite layered nanoclusters
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26604-26610
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04475D, Paper

Xiaodi Zhang, Xiyuan Tong, Junyang Wang, Xinyu Zhu, Zhuozhe Li, Fang Fang, Kun Qian, Yifeng E
Electrochemical activation improves amorphous catalyst performance. Activation regulates the Cu oxidation state, improving hydrogen evolution performance. Cu2+1O plays a crucial role in improving the catalysts' stability.
